attributes.action: arrange for the creation of youth-targeted combined army and fruit promotion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government should produce colourful and educational literature aimed at children and centred around portraying our armed services as well as fruit and vegetables in a positive light.

They could feature humorous cartoon characters / role-models like "Army Banana", "Navy Potato" or "RAF Cucumber".

This may encourage the next generation to join the forces and defend our country and may even help combat the ever-growing tide of youth obesity by making both the army and fruit seem "cool" as well as enforcing the link between healthy eating and physical strength.

It would better overall health and ultimatley a stronger national defence force.
